overview: Sakharam comes to city in search of work. He starts assisting his uncle, who works as a typist outside the post office. One night, he meets Shalan, who has killed her stalker and asks Sakharam to pose as her husband in order to escape from cops. Sakharam can't take Shalan's arrogance and decides to teach her a lesson.
title: Asla Navra Nakoga Bai
